import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import Sidebar from './Sidebar'; const MobileSidebar = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { return (
); }; export default MobileSidebar;
